event.executesql: BEGIN UPDATE exceptionDefinition SET exceptionCategoryId = 'F03688E5-3368-4CE2-BD5F-BF600A051353' WHERE exceptionDefId in (SELECT exceptionDefId FROM exceptionDefinition WHERE customLoanId is not NULL and exceptionDefName in ('Booking Team Check Back', 'Post-Closing Review', 'Insurance Review', 'Tax Monitoring', 'Imaging', 'Quality Review', 'Portfolio Review', 'Compliance Review')) END
